short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to developers to navigate through Bitbucket repositories using a query language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bitbucket Query Language (BQL) Chrome Extension - Smart, Private, and Efficient

BQL is a powerful tool designed to help developers seamlessly navigate through Bitbucket repositories. With a simple query syntax, you can access a wide variety of Bitbucket resources such as repositories, branches, tags, commits, pull requests, pipelines, deployments, and more.

Key Features:

Simplified Navigation: Effortlessly open repositories, branches, commits, pull requests, pipelines, and compare branches or tags with a straightforward query language.
Comprehensive Commands: From opening a specific repository to inspecting commits and pull requests, the extension offers commands to access various Bitbucket resources directly.
Macros for Multi-Repository Queries: Run the same query across multiple repositories at once. BQLâ€™s macro functionality allows you to save time by managing and querying multiple repositories in a single command.
Intelligent Activity Tracking: The extension smartly tracks your interactions within Bitbucket, giving you quick access to repositories, commit histories, and pull requests.
Privacy-First Approach: Your data is never stored in the cloud. All activities and queries are processed locally on your device, ensuring that your work remains private and secure.
Future Enhancements: Upcoming features include file navigation with specific line and column numbers, and much more to come.
Whether you're a developer exploring the depths of your project or a student learning about version control, BQL enhances your Bitbucket experience, saving you time and effort. Try it out and streamline your workflow!
